"* This game is input-based, it will end after a number correct answer is entered
* You will need to input x unique word in order to complete the game
* The point you gain will based on the length of the word you entered
* An extra random condition appear for each new input, fulfil them to double the point of the word
* When the word is incorrect / not found in our codex, you get deduced 100 points and have to try again "

"* This game is round-based, which mean that the game will end after a number of rounds has ended 
* In each round, there will be a word which you need to spell out 
* You will be only provided with an audio and IPA of the word
* You need to drag and drop each letter into the correct position to form the correct word 
* A round will end when all positions have been filled, after that point will be added and a new word will be generated to start a new round 
* For each word you get correct, you will get 1000 points, and a bonus for each subsequent correct word 
* When the word is incorrect, the bonus is lost and you will not gain any point for that round "

* This game is round-based, it will end after a number of round has passed 
* In each round, there will be an scrambled word
* You need to drag and drop each letter into the correct position to form the correct word 
* A round will end when all positions have been filled, after that point will be added and a new word will be generated to start a new round
* For each word you get correct, you will get 1000 points, and a bonus for each subsequent correct word
* When the word is incorrect, the bonus is lost and you will not gain any point for that round
Do you really want to go back? Some data will not be saved.
Which one of these word is different from the others?\n
Choose the correct information from the conversation
